title: Photograph, View of the altar of an unidentified church, 1904–13
title_raw: View of the altar of an unidentified church
description:
Designed by Leon Dabo (1868–1960); for J. and R. Lamb Co.
Vertical rectangle: A side chapel, in which are two Saints, represented by statues in spired, canopied niches, left and right of the reredos. Stained glass windows above; center, the crucifixion. Altar rail of metalwork; panels with fleur-de-lis in quatrefoils; on the gate, medallions of angels.

Same church as 1961-83-5.

tombstone.epitaph:
Photograph, View of the altar of an unidentified church, 1904–13. Printed on sensitized paper. 
1961-83-4
